connectorDescriptor.description: Composite install of the latest m2e v1.3 components. Installing this will automatically uninstall any legacy versions of m2eclipse.
connectorDescriptor.name: Maven Integration for Eclipse 1.3

overview.summary: The purpose of this composite install is to ease the upgrade of the Maven Eclipse integration from older versions of m2eclipse that shipped with STS 2.7.2 and before to the new Eclipse-hosted version m2e 1.3 and beyond, including compatible extensions for WTP, for example. Installing this extension will automatically uninstall any legecy version of m2eclipse currently in your STS.

Installing this extension will automatically uninstall any legecy version of m2eclipse currently in your STS.

connectorDescriptor.description: PMD is a Java source code analyzer. It finds unused variables, empty catch blocks, unnecessary object creation, and so forth.
connectorDescriptor.name: PMD

connectorDescriptor.description: The purpose of the Groovy-Eclipse plugin is to promote the Groovy platform and ecosystem as a viable and productive development environment for Java developers.
connectorDescriptor.name: Groovy-Eclipse

overview.summary: The purpose of the Groovy-Eclipse plugin is to promote the Groovy platform and ecosystem as a viable and productive development environment for Java developers working in the Eclipse SDK.

connectorDescriptor.description: This feature provides the Groovy 2.1 compiler for Groovy-Eclipse. Once installed, the 2.1 compiler becomes the default for the workspace. And other compilers can be uses through the system preferences.
connectorDescriptor.name: Groovy 2.1 Compiler for Groovy-Eclipse

overview.summary: The Groovy 2.1 compiler provides a static compilation mode for Groovy and many other features. However, it is not compatible with the most recent version of Grails 2.x.

connectorDescriptor.description: This feature provides integration between Groovy-Eclipse and M2Eclipse. Only install this feature if you are using Groovy and Maven inside of STS
connectorDescriptor.name: Groovy-Eclipse Configurator for M2Eclipse

overview.summary: This feature provides the Groovy-Eclipse configurator for M2Eclipse

connectorDescriptor.description: Spring Roo is a next-generation rapid application development tool for Java developers. With Roo you can easily build full Java applications in minutes.

connectorDescriptor.description: Infinitest is a continuous test runner for JUnit tests. Whenever you change a class, Infinitest runs your tests for you. It’s smart about what tests to run.
connectorDescriptor.name: Infinitest

overview.summary: Infinitest is a continuous test runner for JUnit tests. Whenever you change a class, Infinitest runs your tests for you. It’s smart about what tests to run, and only runs the ones you need. It reports test errors in the same way Eclipse reports compile errors, and provides additional information that helps you write better tests.
